data.text:
@SoulNesting #SoulNestingChat 

A6: That normal is quite toxic and extremely ableist. Maybe we need to rethink what that even means.

@SoulNesting #soulnestingchat A6 
A few i have seen breaking for a large humanity are: 

Humans are invincible now.
Success = more work; more power or titles. 
We know it all.
Life happens in office 
==
Q i have - how far we remember lessons & not fall back in same cycle .

@TruckingWriter I was thinking the same this evening and then I realized it depends on our source. The invisible piece when "the obvious is incomplete"
#SoulNestingChat
@SoulNesting A6. Sorry need more than a tweet to answer this question, in short we need to reimagine what normal is, instead of returning to normal, is there something better? #SoulNestingChat
@SoulNesting A6: Oddly, I think compassion for others would have been amplified as a result of the past two years, but I don't see that nearly enough. #SoulNestingChat
